import React, { useState, useRef } from 'react'; import "./Card.scss" const Card = (props) => { const [arr, setArr] = useState([]) const scrollContainerRef = useRef(null); function down(val) { const section = scrollContainerRef.current const scrollValue = val.target.scrollTop; const scrollDuration = 500; const scrollStep = section.scrollHeight / scrollDuration * 15; if (scrollValue >= 1 && scrollValue < 430) { let scrollPosition = section.scrollTop; const scrollInterval = setInterval(() => { scrollPosition += scrollStep; section.scrollTo(0, scrollPosition); if (scrollPosition >= section.scrollHeight - section.clientHeight) { clearInterval(scrollInterval); } }, 15); } } return (
